name: Terminus Assault Greaves
description: The Terminus Armor is environmentally sealed with an independent air supply for use in space and extreme planetary conditions. Its onboard microframe computer runs a suite of battle management software. To prevent detection by passive thermal sensors, body heat is channeled to the base of the feet and dispersed into the ground.
setBonus: Set bonus (2 of 4): +1 bonus to melee attack and damage rolls.
Set bonus (4 of 4): You have resistance to cold and fire damage. You have advantage on stealth checks against thermal sensors and creatures or devices using infrared vision.
features: Increase your walking speed by <me-distance length='10' />.
